amendment.description: Amendment restores the set-aside for the Main Street grant program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-509 to restore the set-aside for the Main Street grant program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mahoney (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Mahoney (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mahoney (FL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
